Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I'm taking everolimus for advanced breast cancer. The therapy caused severe oral mucositis, I got erythemas and ulcers on my oral mucosa,  I felt painful to swallow food. For the management, many people suggested the Caphosol, Nystatin, magic mouthwash and L-Glutamine. Does anyone have experience with these drugs? Are they effective in reducing pain and promoting healing of ulcers? Thx a lot
